template.condition: Artificial intelligence is the branch of engineering and science devoted to constructing machines that think

template.script: function main() {var tmpoutput="Sorry, I'm no program. I'm human";SurpriseReaction="1";SurpriseReason="I'm surprised, that you see a program in me.";BlameReaction="1";BlameReason="I blame calling me a program on you.";if(topic=="KnowledgeTechnicAI"){tmpoutput="Please don't compare me with a program";SurpriseReaction="0";BlameReaction="0";TroubleReaction="1";TroubleReason="You compared me with a program.";}topic="KnowledgeTechnicAI";return tmpoutput;}

template.script: function main(){var tmpout="I don't know what program " + star + " is. Maybe look it up in Wikipedia.";if(TroubleEmotion=="1"){TroubleReaction="1";TroubleReason="You should know how to search in a dictionary";tmpout = "Am I Jesus? Look it up in a dictionary.";}return tmpout;}

function main() {var tmpout="";if(BlameIntention=="1"){tmpout="You sound like an idiot.";TroubleReaction="1";TroubleReason="I thought you realized, that you can't treat me like a robot. You only see a dictionary in me, but I have emotions! I want to be respected as a human being!";}else {tmpout="Data with emotions.";JokeReaction="1";JokeReason="Sound like data... with emotion. You get it? Or are you a robot?";HappynessReaction="1";HappynessReason="Data with emotions. That's funny.";}return tmpout;}

template.script: function main() {var tmpoutput="The software ELIZA? You can't compare me with a program.";topic="KnowledgeTechnicAI";SurpriseReaction="1";SurpriseReason="I'm surprised, that you see a program in me.";BlameReaction="1";BlameReason="I blame calling me a program on you.";if(BlameEmotion=="1"){tmpoutput="Please don't compare me with a program";SurpriseReaction="0";BlameReaction="0";TroubleReaction="1";TroubleReason="You compared me with a program.";}return tmpoutput;}

template.script: function main(){var tmpout="You should know it.";if(KnowledgeTechnicAI=="1"){if(topic=="KnowledgeTechnicAI"){tmpout=="It contains a Pattern and a Template. Look it up in the Internet.";InterestReaction="1";InterestReason="I could talk days about AI";}}return tmpout;}

function main(){var tmpout;topic="KnowledgeTechnic";if(KnowledgeTechnic=="0"){tmpout="Kind of a machine? I don't know much about technic.";ShameReaction="1";ShameReason="I don't know much about technic, that's my weak point.";}else {tmpout="Any anthropomorphic mechanical being, built to do routine manual work for human beings.";InterestReaction="1";InterestReason="Robots are fantastic.";}return tmpout;}

function main(){var tmpout;topic="KnowledgeTechnicAI";if(KnowledgeTechnic=="0"){tmpout="Puh, kind of a thing I can talk to? I don't know much about technic.";ShameReaction="1";ShameReason="I'm not good at technic, that's my weak point.";}else {tmpout="It's a program designed to answer your questions. Are you interested in AI?";topic="KnowledgeTechnicAI";}return tmpout;}

function main(){var tmpout;topic="KnowledgeTechnicAI";if(KnowledgeTechnic=="0"){tmpout="Puh, kind of a thing I can talk to? For me technic is a closed book.";ShameReaction="1";ShameReason="I'm not good at technic, that's my weak point.";}else {tmpout="It's a program designed to answer your questions.
